h1_title: Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough
content: The Ancient Guanyin Temple is a Secret Area found in Chapter 1's Black Wind Mountain of Black Myth Wukong. Below you'll find a guide to accessing the temple with all three bell locations, and how to defeat the secret Yaoguai King boss, Elder Jinchi.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_1_Secret-Ancient_Guanyin_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 1 Secret - Ancient Guanyin Temple Walkthrough'.
The content is as follows:
The Ancient Guanyin Temple is a Secret Area found in Chapter 1's Black Wind Mountain of Black Myth Wukong. Below you'll find a guide to accessing the temple with all three bell locations, and how to defeat the secret Yaoguai King boss, Elder Jinchi.
